name: Mushroom Ceviche
keywords: appetizer, extra virgin olive oil, ginger, lemon juice, red bell pepper, scallion, white mushrooms, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1/4 cup finely minced red bell pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place mushrooms in a bowl and toss with olive oil. In another bowl, combine lemon juice, garlic, ginger, jalapeno pepper and salt to taste. Add mushrooms, and marinate 30 minutes at room temperature.
Add the scallions and dill, and marinate for another 30 minutes. Check the seasonings, sprinkle with diced red pepper and serve.
